text: int main ( ) { int i , j , k , l , m , n , arr [ 3500 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & k ) ; for ( m = 0 ; m < k ; m ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ ( i * ( i + 1 ) / 2 ) + j ] ) ; } if ( n >= 2 ) { for ( i = n - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { arr [ ( i * ( i + 1 ) / 2 ) + j ] = arr [ ( i * ( i + 1 ) / 2 ) + j ] + max ( arr [ ( i + 1 ) * ( i + 2 ) / 2 + j ] , arr [ ( i + 1 ) * ( i + 2 ) / 2 + j + 1 ] ) ; } } } printf ( "%d\n" , arr [ 0 ] ) ; } exit ( 1 ) ; return 0 ; } int max ( int a , int b ) { if ( a < b ) return b ; else return a ; }
